text:
Red Orange Yellow Green,
Four of the colours of the rainbow

Blue Indigo Violet,
Three more to make the full set

So Colin you must not forget
All the lovely colours of the rainbow

You can change red blue or green
And all the lovely colours in between

Red Orange Yellow Green,
Four of the colours of the rainbow

Blue Indigo Violet,
Three more to make the full set

So Colin Chameleon donâ€™t you know
You can match the colours of the rainbow

Red yellow green and blue
What an amazing thing

Oh what a lovely thing
What a wonderful thing you can do
